entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
